message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $160. It's the best I can do at this point.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was really hoping to get closer to the price I had in mind. Would you be willing to go down to $150?

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target price, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable going all the way down to $150. I'm willing to offer it to you for $155, which is the lowest I can go.

I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but I'm really close to walking away. I'm willing to meet you at $152, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to look elsewhere.
